metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9271 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: The commandline package update tool zypper writes HTTP proxy credentials into its logfile, allowing local attackers to gain access to proxies used.

notes.Note: ebarretto> No fix available as of 2020-12-28.

criterions.comment: zypper package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
